original_title: March 1, 2020 - Ron Carter New Foursight Quartet in concert
overview: On March 1, 2020, the city of Katowice in Poland turned into the world epicenter of jazz for one evening.  The reason?  The concert of two giants: Ron Carter and Richard Galliano.  In this second part Ron Carter performs with the Ron Carter New Foursight Quartet:  Rene Rosnes on piano, Jimmy Greene on saxophone and Payton Crossley on drums.
title: March 1, 2020 - Ron Carter New Foursight Quartet in concert
